TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DoubleType extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class has been deprecated as of Visual Basic 2005.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class provides methods for manipulating data that potentially represents a `Double` value.

Docs.summary: Returns a value that corresponds to the specified object and optional number format information.
